snippet: The activist investor Knight Vinke says UBS could adopt something like a partnership structure as part of its plan to split wealth management from investment banking. That’s overambitious at the moment, the author contends.
abstract: The activist investor Knight Vinke says UBS could adopt something like a partnership structure as part of its plan to split wealth management from investment banking. That’s overambitious at the moment, the author contends.

headline.main: The Hurdles to Reviving an Investment Bank Partnership
